tools.name: generate_full_tea_timer_url
tools.description: Constructs and returns the FULL ABSOLUTE URL for the Tea Timer application. You must concatenate the base URL with the query parameters. For local development, the base is 'http://localhost:5173/tea-timer/'. For production, the base is 'https://magnabb.github.io/tea-timer/'. Example result: 'https://magnabb.github.io/tea-timer/?config=(3-5)->10&name=Oolong'. Do NOT return a relative path.

name.description: The name of the tea or configuration.

config.description: The configuration string defining the stages (e.g., '(3-5) -> 10 -> 15').
